properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO ,MEM_ID ,MEM_NAME ,MEM_PWD ,MEM_TEL ,MEM_EMAIL ,MEM_ADDRESS ,MEM_DETAIL_ADDRESS ,MEM_LATITUDE ,MEM_LONGTITUDE ,MEM_ENROLLDATE ,MEM_STATUS ,MEM_DEL_DATE ,MEM_DEL_DETAIL ,MEM_ADS ,MEM_BLOCK ,MEM_REPORT ,SITTER_ACCESS FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN SITTER ON(MEM_NO= SITTER_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_BLOCK = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND (MEM_EMAIL = ? OR MEM_TEL = ?) AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_BLOCK = 'N'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_TEL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_BLOCK = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_MEMO = ? WHERE MEM_ID=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_MEMO='Y' WHERE MEM_ID=? AND MEM_MEMO=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ?, MEM_MEMO=null WHERE MEM_ID= ? AND MEM_MEMO='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM favorite WHERE mem_no=?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SITTER_NO,MEM_NAME, SITTER_TITLE,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME PATH FROM SITTER S JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEM_NO = SITTER_NO) JOIN FAVORITE F USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(SITTER_NO=AT_NO) WHERE F.MEM_NO =? AND AT_CATEGORY='SITTER_PIC' AND FILE_LEVEL=1 ORDER BY SITTER_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO FAVORITE F (MEM_NO, SITTER_NO) SELECT ?,? FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FAVORITE F WHERE MEM_NO=? AND SITTER_NO=?)
DELETE FROM FAVORITE WHERE MEM_NO=? AND SITTER_NO=?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_PWD , MEM_TEL , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_DETAIL_ADDRESS , MEM_LATITUDE , MEM_LONGTITUDE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_TEL = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_ADDRESS = ? , MEM_DETAIL_ADDRESS = ? , MEM_LATITUDE = ? , MEM_LONGTITUDE = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_PWD , MEM_TEL , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_DETAIL_ADDRESS , MEM_LATITUDE , MEM_LONGTITUDE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , MEM_DEL_DATE = SYSDATE , MEM_DEL_DETAIL = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_BLOCK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEM_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_BLOCK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND LOWER(MEM_ID) LIKE ? ORDER BY MEM_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_ADDRESS = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
